runs.comm: He starts off with a very wide one outside offstump
overpitched this time, Michael Clarke cracks that uppishly through the covers, an acrobatic dive from the fielder doesn't stop the ball from screaming to the boundary
much better this time, pitches a touch outside off and comes in to the batsman, left alone by Clarke
shortens the length a bit, defended back to the bowler by Clarke
good carry through to the keeper, Louw keeps it around off, on a length, Clarke is content to shoulder arms
overpitched on middle and leg, Clarke works it away towards midwicket, superb running from the batsmen fetches them a couple
attempted slower delivery, ends up as a wide down the legside, not the wisest choice when there no protection at the boundary at fine leg
Clarke's given room to free his arms, he mistimes it to cover
fullish on legstump, Warner misses it , big shout but that was sliding down
follows that up with one down the leg side, that's a wide
defended back to the bowler by Warner
quick bouncer from Abdulla, came onto the bat quicker than Warner expected, he mistimes the pull, it swirls in the air but lands safe beyond midwicket
the debutant is really mixing it up here, a a yorker this time, just outside off, Warner is beaten
superb first over from Abdulla, short slower one this time, Warner was totally deceived and was nearly through with his pull before the ball came on to the bat, he nearly drags it back to the stumps
a wide down the leg side from Abdulla
length ball, a touch outside off, Warner pushes it towards cover point
length ball just outside off, Clarke walks into an off drive, not particularly well-timed but it runs away between the bowler and mid-off for four
slower ball, with the legcutter's action, kept a touch low, Clarke defends it to the off
turned with soft hands towards midwicket, the batsmen hurry through for a single
angling into the pads, easily glanced away by Warner to the fine-leg boundary, that was a poor delivery from Louw
much better line from Louw, on offstump, pitches back of a length, Warner defends it watchfully
overpitched on the pads, Louw was lucky that punch from Warner didn't beat the wide mid-on
full on middle and off, Clarke punches it down the ground, not powerfully enough to beat the mid-off
the crowd gets to see the famous Warner swing, that was a bit short, Warner rocks back and swats that over long-on, just clears the boundary
a little fuller this time, Warner jabs it towards mid-on, decides against the single
back of a length, on legstump, Warner gets it away towards midwicket for a single
slower delivery,122kmph, rolls his fingers  across the seam, Clarke glides it towards point
another slower ball to finsih the over, Clarke doesn't spot it, he lets it through and the ball bounces a couple of times before reaching the keeper
slower delivery from Albie to start, powerfully cut away by Warner, Botha gives chase but a despairing dive isn't enough to get the ball back
a bit of width again, Warner slashes it through the off, Peterson gives chase,  dives head first near the boundary to stop the ball
played with an angled bat towards backward point, goes too quickly to the bowler to take a single
pushed towards mid-off, the batsmen steal a quick single

Morkel gets the breakthrough South Africa needed so badly, Warner is bowled by a full delivery on middle and off, Warner comes down the track and tries to loft it down the ground, misses the ball and his stumps are shattered
Ponting lunges forward to drive through the off, gets a thick outside edge which flies through the vacant gully region towards deep third man
Ponting again feels for the ball outside off, that was 139 kmph, Ponting is beaten by that one

Ponting's gone this time, caught behind pushing at a length ball, he was ill at ease in his first two deliveries as well, and this one comes in a fraction after pitching outside off, Ponting took a big stride forward to drive, feathered it through to the keeper
Hussey is pushed to the backfoot by Abdulla, dabs it at his feet and sets off for a quick single
a bit of width for Clarke, he guides that behind point, third man had to run around to cut that one off
short ball on offstump, Clarke wanted to pull that one, but gets an edge and the ball balloons to the off side, lands safely short of covers
jabbed towards the covers, batsmen scurry through for a single
first ball angles across the batsman, takes a thick edge down to third man for a single
cut away towards point for a single
wide down the leg side from Albie Morkel
back of a length on offstump, tapped towards mid-off, and another quick single is taken
length ball on middle and leg, David Hussey decides to play that off the back foot, he only manages to pat it back to the bowler
test him with the bouncer, Hussey goes for the pull but doesn't make contact
full on middle and leg, Hussey backs away and drives towards extra cover, a loud 'No' from him when Clarke calls for the single as he had struck that pretty firmly
a touch short, Clarke backed away and pushed it to covers for a single
Hussey also gets a single in the same region
Clarke looks to cut it but gets a  fine edge, which runs down towards third man boundary, just kept in by the fielder
ovedrpitched by van der Merwe, Hussey carves that square on the off side for a boundary, not much power behind that shot but it raced to the boundary
defends towards covers with soft hands, quick single
full toss from van der Merwe, outside off, Clarke thrashes it but straight to mid-off, missed out on that one
clubbed towards long-on for a single
Clarke goes for the sweep, it raps his pad and goes through to the keeper, some stifled appeals for a caught behind
pushed in quick on middle, Clarke steps down the track but can only push it back to the bowler
on legstump, worked to fine leg, but no run as it goes straight to the fielder
overpitched on middle and leg, driven along the ground to long-on for a single
length ball outside off, Clarke backs away to make room for the cut, placement is good enough to fetch him a couple
Clarke steps down the ground and away to leg, van der Merwe follows him and Clarke can't get that one away
this is dabbed towards cover for a single
Hussey walks across to play that behind square on the leg side
punched to mid-on, no run
Clakre moves away from legstump and crashes the ball towards long-off, doesn't beat the fielder at the boundary
Clarke is bowled, the runs had dried up in the last couple of overs, Clarke went for a powerful sweep to a beautifully flighted delivery from Botha, missed the ball which homed in on middle stump

he's run-out off the first ball, Ferguson shuffled across the stumps to tickle it to fine leg, van der Merwe was quickly onto the ball, he threw the ball to the non-striker's end where Botha breaks the stumps before Ferguson can make his ground, great fielding from South Africa
clipped to long-on for an easy single
turned to midwicket, but no time for a single
White nudges that from outside off to fine leg, wide enough of the fielder to take a single
full on legstump, White whips it to midwicket for a single
lovely shot from Hussey, length ball outside off, Hussey chips it over the infield for a one-bounce four, he played that one inside-out
this was a touch shorter, White dabs it to backward point
turned to square leg for a single
played back to the bowler
swept for a single to retain the strike
a paddle sweep from Hussey, fine enough to fetch him a boundary, much-needed runs these
the doosra from Botha, a single towards mid-off
lofted over the infield to the long-off boundary
yorker on legstump, turned to square leg
played back to the bowler
whipped down to long-on for a single
clips it to backward square leg
punched down to long-on by Hussey after taking a few steps down the ground
good yorker from Peterson, dug out back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler by White
White shows off his hitting ability, that one goes a long way over the boundary, between long-on and midwicket
fired in again, White drives it to long on
this time Hussey shows us what a clean hitter he is, somehow gets under a full ball from van der Merwe,  mishits it, and the ball goes very high but long enough to clear the long-on boundary
hammered past the bowler, the runs are coming in fast for Australia, that one screams down the ground to the boundary
another mishit from Hussey, this pone doesn't go long enough, the inside out shot ends up in the hands of Gibbs at long-off
driven inside out towards mid-off
fired in full on legstump, nudged towards midwicket, the fielder is onto the ball in a flash, nearly a run-out but the throw is a yard wide of the stumps
flighted delivery on middle and leg by Botha, turned to midwicket
full and fast on middle and off, driven to mid-off for an easy single
lot of turn for Botha, pitched outside on a length outside off, rapped Haddin on the pads but was spinning away down leg
clipped to long-on for a single
length ball on off, driven firmly back to the bowler, no run again
length ball, pitching on leg, White tried to launch that one over long-on, doesn't hit it well enough, finds the safe hands of JP Duminy at the boundary
whistling down leg, nudged towards sqaure leg, Botha is onto the ball in a jiffy, and doesn't allow the single
Botha has more fielding to do, this time the ball comes straight at him
very full on off, Hopes drive firmly to extra cover
gets a single this time by whipping it to midwicket
drops it short when he saw Haddin advancing down the track, it wa on legstump, Haddin gets it away towards long-on
Hopes goes for the sweep to a full ball outside off, doesn't make contact and the ball cannons off the pads towards backward point
caught by Gibbs at midwicket, that was a no-ball though as it was a high full toss outside off
length ball is driven down to long-on by Haddin
another high full toss, but not high enough to be deemed a no-ball, Hopes gets on his knee and swats it to midwicket, Albie has to dive to cut that one off
another high full toss, this was pretty close to a no-ball, a heave toward midwicket is mistimes, the edge swirls to safety, falling right in middle of three converging fielders
forced to sweeper cover for a couple
drilled down the ground, Duminy moves swiftly across from long-on to cut it off
great ball to end the over, yorker wide outside off,  but close enough to be a legitimate delivery, the batsman can't get that one away
clever bowling from Morkel, the batsmen was looking to give himself room, Morkel followed him and sent down a perfect yorker just outside legstump
carted to mid-off for a couple
the batsmen charges down the track and lashes it down to long-on again
again following the batsman who was backing away, whipped towards square leg
a yorker, it is driven to long-off  for a single
Hopes provides them with one of those, swats the final ball of the over into the crowd behind midwicket
overpitched first ball, Haddin carves it toward extra cover, only a single

Hopes is gone, deceived by the slower one, good thinking from Louw, Hopes was coming down the track, he sent in a shorter, slower one, which Hopes mishits to midwicket, Albie takes a diving catch to send Hopes on his way
swatted to the long-on boundary, could have been another wicket if Duminy had held on to that, he only manages to push the ball over the boundary
full from Louw, outside off, swept firmly by Haddin but only for a single
Louw gets another wicket, Bracken's gone, the batsman was backing away to flatbat it down the ground, he gets a top edge to the short ball which balloons to AB de Villiers at mid-off
yorker on middle and leg, worked to the leg side for a single, and that's victory for South Africa
